New Records: Giroud is making his 33rd appearance at a major tournament for France, a new mark that usurps the previous record-holder Lilian Thuram.
Post-Match Reflections: France settle for second place as Robert Lewandowski earns Poland point
Miscellaneous Highlights: The whistle goes. A valedictory draw for the Poles, who thoroughly deserved it. France were disappointing and are disappointed.
Others: France go through in second place, which they can hardly complain about, seeing they’ve only got one penalty and an own goal to their name in three matches.
